name: GOOGLE INBOX DARK THEME (with green message text)
description:
A minor update on https://userstyles.org/styles/114870/google-inbox-dark-theme-june-2015 
* message text: green on dark (should override HTML settings)
* contact
* light background for controls
* attachment sidebar
* many other small fixes...
additional_info:
2016-09-17
* HTML messages style should be ignored and output is green text on black
* Few control fixes (put them on darkgray background).
2016-09-23
* Overall background was set to be almost black
* Improved contacts in border input.

discussions.name: Very cool style for Google Inbox
